string-array.name: challenge1Descriptions
string-array.item: First open Blender and delete the default cube by pressing x
Then scale the cylinder to look like a pen
Add a torus and scale it to the size that you want
Move the torus Up to the lid of the pencil
Add a cone and scale it to look like a pencil tip and move it up
And like that you completed your first challenge hope you enjoyed it
